extendedInfo.description: Do you like guns? Then you will love Overkill 2!Over 30 realistic 3D guns are waiting for you in this shooter, ready to be upgraded and used in intensive battles. Modify your weapon the way you feel it should be and take it to the action!Overkill 2 is a great-looking shooter with a unique combination of easy controls and challenging gameplay. It takes you to the city occupied by a deadly faction where only you and your gun can make a difference.Fight against tough opponents who will have you pay for every mistake. This is not a roller coaster ride, this is war! Luckily for you, you will have a vast arsenal of combat equipment and support items at your disposal.Be ready to customize and fire pistols, shotguns, assault and sniper rifles, and heavy machine guns. If youâre aiming for a big boom then the mounted grenade launcher is the right baby for you! And when the situation gets really nasty, make sure to call for an air strike and rain destruction at the most resistant of foes!The greatest features of Overkill 2 in a nutshell:â 30+ realistic 3D guns that are most used in today's global warfareâ Multiple weapon upgrades with tactical useâ Intensive shooter action with stunning graphicsâ Vast arsenal of armors and equipmentâ Unique mix of easy controls and challenging gameplayâ Combat shotguns, pistols, assault rifles, heavy machine guns & sniper riflesâ Bloodthirsty 3D enemiesâ Merciless dronesâ Survival Modeâ Gun collectionsâ Gun showcasingâ Missions & Achievementsâ Callsignsâ Leaderboardsâ Black Market with unique gunsAnd of course a ton of â Explosions â Blood & â ViolenceMake no mistake about it: Overkill 2 is only for the toughest of shooters. It will test your will, it will test your reflexes, it will make you sweat in places you didnât even know about.Arm yourself to the teeth and see if you belong to the elite!

reviews.title: Amazing....but
reviews.comment: Force closes every time I hit survival mode. I can\'t progress in the game because of survival mode requirements. Plz fix this!

reviews.title: Good but glitchy
reviews.comment: If opponent quits match i lose and have to start over...wtf...aimer jumps fast then sluggish then it will begood for a bit...overall a pretty decent game just takes forever to get money and medals without buying them

reviews.title: Crash problem
reviews.comment: The game is crashing after i bought a new weapon, please fix this problem. Overall the game is better than the first Overkill

reviews.title: Asus nexus 7
reviews.comment: Fix your broken game already or remove it from Google market....it still crashes and won\'t open....    Update ....still keeps crashing on Asus nexus 7...update...the game still force close on startup  the numerous updates done nothing...Google please remove this game from your market

reviews.title: Bugs
reviews.comment: Extremely buggy on my htc DNA. The game is incredibly inaccurate and force closes quite a bit. Needs to be more responsive and accurate and not force close so often.

reviews.title: Fully loaded!
reviews.comment: I love this game! A must to download!

reviews.title: Awesome, no matter what.
reviews.comment: Great game i now have BOTH Overkills. Both have high ratings. All these fu*kings haters can fu*k off. Keep making great games like this. :)
reviews.author: Florence Wolfe

reviews.title: Best shooter I\'ve played on a smart device.
reviews.comment: I\'m playing this game on the Galaxy Note 8. it\'s a lot of fun, but when I try to link my account the game crashes. Please fix this so that I can fully enjoy all that this game has to offer. Other than that I love it.

reviews.title: best ever but hard medals
